ViewAttribute.Name: PiNumber
ViewAttribute.Expression: select pi_number from WFM_PIS where WFM_PIS.ID = FmsdomGoods.Pi_Id

ViewAttribute.Name: PiCategory
ViewAttribute.Expression: select pi_category from WFM_PIS where WFM_PIS.ID = FmsdomGoods.Pi_Id

ViewAttribute.Name: StockStatus
ViewAttribute.Expression: select stock_status from FMS_WARRANTS where FMS_WARRANTS.PI_ID = FmsdomGoods.Pi_Id AND ROWNUM = 1

ViewAttribute.Name: LandedDate
ViewAttribute.Expression: select creation_time from WFM_PIS where WFM_PIS.ID = FmsdomGoods.Pi_Id

ViewAttribute.Name: SourcePiId
ViewAttribute.Expression: select DOM_GOODS.PI_ID from DOM_GOODS where DOM_GOODS.ID = FmsdomGoods.SOURCE_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BrandDisplay
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SHORT_NAME FROM GEN_CODE_TRANSLATIONS WHERE OWNING_ENTITY = 'GEN_WARRANT_BRANDS' AND OWNING_CODE = concat(concat(:pCorporationCode_bvar, FmsdomGoods.COMMODITY_CODE), FmsdomGoods.BRAND) AND LANGUAGE_CODE = :pLanguageCode_bvar

ViewAttribute.Name: ThirdpartyIdCustomer
ViewAttribute.Expression: select fmsdom_parties.thirdparty_id from fmsdom_parties where pi_id = FmsdomGoods.PI_ID and party_qualifier = 'CUST' and rownum = 1

ViewAttribute.Name: CommodityStateDisplay
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT SHORT_NAME FROM GEN_CODE_TRANSLATIONS WHERE OWNING_ENTITY = 'GEN_WARRANT_COM_STATES' AND OWNING_CODE = FmsdomGoods.COMMODITY_STATE AND LANGUAGE_CODE = :pLanguageCode_bvar

ViewAttribute.Name: PickedBy
ViewAttribute.Expression: select dg.id from dom_goods dg inner join wfm_pis pis on dg.pi_id = pis.id where dg.source_id = FmsdomGoods.Id and pis.pi_category = 'WMS' and rownum = 1

ViewAttribute.Name: CommodityCodeNameTranslated
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT NAME FROM GEN_CODE_TRANSLATIONS WHERE OWNING_ENTITY = 'GEN_COMMODITY_CODES' AND OWNING_CODE = FmsdomGoods.COMMODITY_CODE AND LANGUAGE_CODE = :pLanguageCode_bvar

ViewAttribute.Name: HasDangerousGoods
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select count(*) from fmsdom_dangerous_goods where fmsdom_dangerous_goods.good_id = FmsdomGoods.id)
